-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | HEPEVT parser
--   
--   This package implements a parser for the ASCII HEPEVT event log file
--   format
@package hepevt
@version 0.5


-- | This module provides a pure haskell implementation of a reader for the
--   ASCII HEPEVT file format, rougly as described at
--   <a>http://cepa.fnal.gov/psm/simulation/mcgen/lund/pythia_manual/pythia6.3/pythia6301/node39.html</a>.
--   Compatibility with the extended format used by HepMC
--   (<a>http://lcgapp.cern.ch/project/simu/HepMC/</a>) is given priority.
module Data.HEPEVT
parseEventFile :: String -> IO [Event]
parseEvents :: ByteString -> [Event]
